action.action-desc: Mr. Ellzey (for himself and Mr. Brady) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To direct the Surface Transportation Board to require any high-speed rail project to acquire all land for the project before starting construction, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: In this Act, the term high-speed rail means passenger ground transportation across a railroad or using magnetic levitation systems where a speed of 125 miles per hour can reasonably be expected to occur.
